```{r setup, include = FALSE}
# Shiny & Flexdashboard libraries
library(shiny)
library(flexdashboard)

# Data libraries
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(viridisLite)
library(leaflegend)
library(RColorBrewer)


source('utils.R')
```

```{r}
dataFile <- reactive({
  input$fileSelect
})

fileExt <- reactive({
  ext <- file_df %>% 
            filter(name == paste0(dataFile()))   
            # filter(name == "salinity_10_10_480m_res_mask_v2.tif")
            
  ext$extension
})
```

### 
```{r}
wellPanel(downloadButton("downloadData"))
```

```{r}
output$downloadData <- downloadHandler(
   filename =  function() {
     # paste0(rasterFile())
      paste0(dataFile())
     },
   # filename =  paste0(datasetInput()),
    content = function(file) {
      if(fileExt() == "shp") {
               # saveRDS(paste0(dataFile()), file=file)
        sf::st_write(sf::read_sf(paste0(dataFile())), file)
      } else if (fileExt() == "tif") {
               raster::writeRaster(raster::raster(paste0(dataFile())), file=file)
      }
              # raster::writeRaster(raster::raster(paste0(dataFile())), file=file)
        # raster::writeRaster(raster::raster(paste0(rasterFile())), file=file)
      # write.csv(mtcars, file=file)
    },
   contentType = NA
  # contentType="text/csv"
)
```
